transcript:
Customer: Allah tera ehsan hai maula bada ehsan.

Hello.
Executive: Ha Sadiq bhai se baat ho rahi hai Machwaal ji se.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Pranjal baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha boliye na.
Executive: Ji sir aapne concern receive hua tha aapne call kiya tha na us time me lunch kar raha tha.
Customer: To unhone kal meri baat hui thi unse.
Executive: Shravan bhai bol rahe the matlab.
Customer: Unke apne 9696 ke bole koi aap to aap to itne purane client hai sir hamare IndiaMART pe itne saalo se ho hamare sath me aapko business bhi mila hai ye service band kyu aane ka plan aapko.
Customer: Business kaha pe mila hai abhi tak to mila nahi ek bari ek first time hi nahi hua kaise chal raha hai ye zero nil bata nil.
Abhi tak ek bhi kaam nahi mila che mahine ho gaye abhi.
Executive: Sir jab tak Abhishek ke paas tha account tab tak aapko mil raha tha.
Customer: Kaha pe?
Executive: Abhishek Abhishek isse pehle account nahi nahi usse usse usse bhi pareshan ho gaya tha me.
Customer: Achcha nahi mujhe laga agar aisa hai ki unse mil raha ho to main unka aapka nahi nahi nahi unse bhi nahi mila wo bhi matlab kya karte hai matlab thoda wo dish ke wo ghal dete hai ek do photo ghal dete hai theek hai bas kaam khallas bas abhi tak aise che mahine nikal diye hamare aur ek bhi wo lead wagera to ek bhi nahi aa rahi ek bhi bol de na.
Wooden bhi aa rahi hai glasses bhi aa rahi hai fiber bhi aa rahi hai aur kaha me apna marble ka.
Executive: Hmm okay.
Customer: Isliye unko pehle kal bol diya tha bola jitna ho sake wo apna wo ghal do email pe apna refund wo ho jayega usme laga.
Executive: Sir abhi to refund nahi ho sakta agar sach batau to aapko is time pe refund ki koi policy nahi hoti sir us time pe wo aapko initial hota hai agar.
Customer: Unhone to bola tha abhi do mahine pehle bhi bola tha aapka jab dil se aaye ek do mahine aur kar lo aapko dekh lo agar kaam mile to theek hai nahi to aap bol dena.
Executive: Sir.
Customer: Unhone bola tha mujhe.
Executive: Ha Abhishek Abhishek ke time pe humne wahi usse bhi refund le rahe the unhone bola Sadiq bhai mere kehne se ek baar karo aap maine aapki profile theek kar di lead wagera aayegi.
Customer: Wahi chalo profile to theek kar di aapki are mujhe nahi chahiye theek profile che mahine ho gaye profile ko theek karte karte hue.
Executive: To Abhishek ne aapko ye baat boli hai ki nahi milega to refund kar dunga.
Customer: Wo usse bhi de rahe the wo to refund.
Executive: Sir us time possible hoga isliye wo de rahe honge baki agar aap bolo to main ek cheez baat ek cheez bolunga to wo jo senior manager wo khud hi call karenge main aapka escalate karunga abhi concern ki Abhishek ne bola hai aapko refund karne ke liye to aap unko bataye refund ke refund ke dost bhi bol rahe the wo unhone bola email pe dal do aap aur unse baat kar lo maine 9696 pe call kiya unhone bola ki inse baat kar lo ho jayega aapka.
Executive: Theek hai sir main aapko batau actually.
Customer: Hamara meri baat suno mera itna bada budget bhi nahi tha fir bhi maine liya hai.
Executive: Machwaal ji mera 33 ha 33000 ka mera tha band aur fir bhi maine maximizer liya hai 76000 ka.
Customer: Abhishek ne diya tha aapko.
Customer: Abhishek nahi wo Vinay ne le liya tha Vinay naam ka tha behnchod ek jana banda unhone uske baato me aa gaya main.
Executive: Achcha Vinay ne becha hai aapko Vinay Bhadoria.
Customer: Ha pata nahi wo aaj call hi nahi uthata hai wo.
Executive: Aur aap kiske through se Vinay mile the kiske through se bhai konse Ashiyana marble wale world stone kiske unka contact raha tha wahi log Vinay ko jante the.
Customer: Vinay ko United white marble.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Unique white marble tha unse ha unique white marble unhone se wo mera do bhai hai wo us time 2022 me start kiya tha apne ha ha to mera 3000 ka band wo tha band nahi uske andar to mera kaam ho raha tha kaam bhi mila mujhe ek do aur isme to maximizer lene ke baad abhi tak ek bhi kaam nahi mila.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Mai samjha samjha samjha maximizer se lene ke baad aapko kaam nahi mila in short ye.
Customer: Are bilkul bhi nahi mila pareshan ho gaya me che mahine ho gaye mere dost ke bhi payment laga di tha isme unhone bola kya kar diya Sadiq bhai tune ke aisa bolte ho kya me kya karu yaar me khud fas gaya inki baato me aa gaya me maine unko bola refund ka kar do apna jaisa bhi ho sake utna refund karo apna Abhishek ko bulaya.
Customer: Abhishek ko unko sabko unke jo 96 wale kiske number hai ye service ke 59696 hai na ha ha 969696 us pe ek baat kiya tha maine.
Executive: Main hi aapka jo hai abhi highlight kar raha hu dekho main apne senior manager se bolta hu is cheez ke liye jaake ki aapko aisa aisa bola gaya hai Abhishek ne bola hai aise aur refund ke liye bhi bola hai to refund us time bhi de rahe the aapko.
Executive: Sir us time possible hoga unke paas hoga kyuki mere paas nahi hai.
Executive: Mere paas to sir.
Customer: Abhi che mahine baki hai mere isme ha abhi che mahine hue paanch mahine che mahine hue isme aur ekdam zero kaam hai isme abhi tak.
Executive: Theek hai sir ek baar mujhe time dijiye main ek baar abhi get kar ke aapko confirm karwata hu are yaar ye lo ek din le lo aadha din le lo kitna hi lo lekin mujhe chahiye bas mera wapis refund chahiye mujhe aur maine tujhe fir me waise baat karunga unse.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai main karta hu dekh lo baat kar lo kis se baat karo fir main fir is pe ghalunga refund is pe.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting any business after subscription.

- Wants a refund for the subscription.

- Claims previous executive promised a refund.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to escalate the issue.

- Will connect with senior manager for resolution.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will confirm after checking with team.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, buyleads, maximizer
